LanguageData.KokuSkullImplantSurgery.label: artificial skull implants
LanguageData.KokuSkullImplantSurgery.description: Unlocks the ability to craft skull implants and install them.
LanguageData.KokuAdvancedSkullImplantSurgery.label: advanced skull implants
LanguageData.KokuAdvancedSkullImplantSurgery.descript: Allows you to craft advanced skull implants.
LanguageData.KokuUltraSkullImplantSurgery.label: ultra skull implants
LanguageData.KokuUltraSkullImplantSurgery.description: Allows you to craft ultra skull implants.
